feels.name: Love
feels.quote: That moment of naturalness was the crystallizing feather-touch: it shook flirtation into love.

feels.name: Happiness
feels.quote: Rosamond, who at the first moment felt as if her happiness were returning...

feels.name: Embarrassment
feels.quote: Miss Vincy was alone, and blushed so deeply when Lydgate came in that he felt a corresponding embarrassment...

feels.name: Terror
feels.quote: Rosamond became very unhappy. The uneasiness first stirred by her auntâ€™s questions grew and grew till at the end of ten days...
